scripts.setup: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: npm run setup && concurrently -n frontend,backend -c blue,green "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm test --prefix frontend && npm test --prefix backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --prefix frontend && npm run test:coverage --prefix backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --prefix frontend && npm run typecheck --prefix backend
scripts.validate: npm run typecheck && npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.verify:all: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm test && npm run test:e2e
